Sitemap: https://ethicalfrenchie.com/sitemap.xml

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block thin/auto-generated FAQ individual pages
Disallow: /faqs/

# Block directory listings
Disallow: /uploads/

# Block HubSpot tracking parameter URLs
Disallow: /*?__hstc=
Disallow: /*?__hssc=
Disallow: /*?__hsfp=

# Block Joomla artifact parameters
Disallow: /*?Itemid=

# Block Facebook click tracking parameters
Disallow: /*?fbclid=
